website_summaries.verdict: This fun rolling pin features adjustable, removable, colorful  discs that make it simple to roll to a desired thickness. Made of solid beechwood, it flattens dough to ensure uniform baking.
pros: Removable discs raise the rolling surface by different amounts to create exactly the required pastry thickness
Measurements are on the pin for easy use
cons: Some have said the rolling pin isn't long enough to roll out large pieces of dough

customer_reviews.title: Why, Joseph? Just why???
customer_reviews.text: The rolling pin itself is awesome and I really like it. I'm rating it low because, honestly, what kind of narcissistic jerk embosses his name into a rolling pin so that every pie crust or cookie dough has "joseph" imprinted on it?! Yeah, they fail to mention that in the description. If I meet Joseph, I'm going to tell him off. Jerkface jerk Joseph. (raspberries) But other than that, it's pretty great, to be fair.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of this rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this rolling pin, and was so excited about using it this weekend for Christmas baking, but mine came with large cracks in the wood, so I can’t use it :-(
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Handy with some quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Aside from general quality issues, this system is genius and I finally mase an even pie crust! Mine had a small crack in the wood on one end, I’ve been careful to apply food grade mineral oil to condition the wood. The rolling pin itself has a slightly rough texture, like it needs to be fine grit sanded or was made with the grain in the wrong direction, but keep it floured and it doesn’t stick to pie crust, etc. The plastic pieces limit how wide you can roll your dough, just aim for a long rectangular shape with cookie dough and it will be fine, plenty wide for pie crusts.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Myers Mccullough

customer_reviews.title: Test immediately!
customer_reviews.text: I had good experiences using my friends Joseph Joseph 20085 so I bought one here. I didn't use it right away and once I did, realized that mine is defective from the factory, it was bored out unevenly, and therefore does not roll properly when using the colored spacers. I see no return/replacement instructions from Joseph Joseph. Be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A Thesing

customer_reviews.title: GTTSD!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I saw the YouTuber (Gone to the snow dogs) use it for her baking. Now I’m in love with this. My cookies come out perfectly even. No complaints on the product.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca F.

customer_reviews.title: Feels and looks like a work of art!
customer_reviews.text: The wood was a little dry when it arrived so I treated it with butcher block oil and wow, what a difference! I'm almost going to feel bad about using it. Almost. I'm not going to feel bad when my friends get jealous about what a nice rolling pin this is! The measuring marks on the body are subtle. The little plastic discs feel very solid, and they're stamped on either side with both inches and millimeters of gap that they add.
customer_reviews.author: Another ShopperTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Rough texture. Dough sticks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for rolling my delicious shortbread cookies. I had high hopes for this rolling pin, but I had to resort back to my 20 plus year old pin. The rolling pin I received had a rough texture which made rolling the cookies smoothly impossible. The dough stuck so badly that I gave up. I tried oiling it, dusting it with cornstarch, but could not get a smooth, consistent dough. I was thinking of buying one for my mother who rolls her own pie crusts, but I won't now. This has been my worst Amazon purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for specific thickness dough's and cookies!
customer_reviews.text: Easily unscrew the ends to add or remove discs for desired thickness. This type is a bit more work than a traditional rolling pin with handles because you have to keep rolling and adjusting your hands rather than just grip a handle. TIP I learned from a pro cookie maker: Roll out your cookie dough between 2 sheets of parchment paper. No adding extra flour, which can dry the cookies. It also keeps dough off the rolling pin. If the paper is shifting, you can moisten the surface underneath to help the paper stay in place or use a silpat under the paper.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - But I did not get the "Joseph" imprint I hippoed for
customer_reviews.text: This made my cookie manufacturing so easy. It's a great product only if you are looking for smooth surfaced, even doughs. If you are a fan of "It's a Wonderful Life" like I am, and think you will get "Joseph" imprints like a Springerle rolling pin based on a certain review, stop right now. Do not order. I rolled and rolled and cut all the Hippi (pl) I wanted for Xmas and none had theJosi (pl) imprint I hippoed for. So it's 5/5 for smooth dough.
customer_reviews.author: mlc2002

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw...
customer_reviews.text: The idea behind this rolling pin is brilliant. There is a design flaw. There are no handles to hold onto while rolling it so it is hard to keep constant pressure. I'm admittedly not using it for dough. I'm using it to roll out clay to make ornaments - I so liked being able to pick a size and hoped to roll it consistently. But having to press down on the round part of the rolling pin and roll it with your hands makes it difficult to roll evenly. Perhaps with dough it isn't an issue. But I love the idea behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Multiple cracks!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, it arrived with multiple cracks through out the pin.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great qualify, great rolling pin!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cool! I needed a rolling pin really bad, because I didn't have one and I was using a wine bottle as a rolling pin... Heh heh. The price on this product is excellent, and I LOVE that it has the removable rings so that I can roll out my dough without needing a pesky ruler nearby. The wood is really nice and I was surprised by the quality of this rolling pin. Remember not to soak the wood or immerse it in water for a long period of time and dry it as soon as you are done washing it. The instructions recommend oiling the wood lightly after each wash, and I would recommend that too.
customer_reviews.author: ValerieTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for a couple of months now and I always roll my cookies in between baking sheets or Saran Wrap, but the wood used for this rolling pin is poor quality. I tried to wash it and it is completely stained and now has a weird smell. I would recommend getting a stainless steel one instead. Having the option to roll out evenly in different thickness is great though. That's a feature I definitely recommend for cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on Hallmark movie, of course they always have baking with flour fights... hubby mentioned how easy it would be do to his family recipe traditional sugar cookies, having that kind of thing to keep them the same thickness. We had no idea such a thing existed. So I grabbed one quick, and set it on the counter right before he began his cookies, he was surprised, and they were perfectly uniform! SO YAY, great item for even baking cookies, easy to clean, and you can adjust it for all thicknesses.
customer_reviews.author: dollmaker

customer_reviews.title: Have been making more pies than usual
customer_reviews.text: OK we were all baking more than usual over the last 6 months. I finally switched from my old roller to this one and will never go back. Who knew??? This worked PERFECTLY for me, used the deeper ring to make a shortbread cookie that I am fond of, and the thinner ones for pies. Even crust = even baking.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Quality Rolling Pin for Uniform Dough Thickness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rolling pin so I could roll out my sugar cookie dough in an even thickness. I love this rolling pin. It is well made and there are several sizes of disks to allow you to roll your dough into different thicknesses so if you want to roll out a pie crust you can choose one thickness and if you later want to roll out a cookie dough you can choose another thickness. The rolling pin itself is long which allows you to roll a pretty good sized piece of dough. It is easy to clean and all the different sized disks store right back on the rolling pin.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Brune

customer_reviews.title: I love buying cooking product
customer_reviews.text: I love buying cooking product. Lol. But this right next to my kitchen aid is my favorite. I love to make noodles and biscuits. This makes this process so much easier. Best rolling pin I've ever use. The rings are easy to remove. Also you have to oil this product. I wash, rub ( very small amount lik a 1/4 of a teaspoon)olive oil and sit in a place this in a place to can dry. Just make sure the oil is food safe. You can also rub into to clean dry rolling pin.
customer_reviews.author: sheena

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I have made my own home made pie shells and other pastry since I was a kid. I always used a regular rolling pin and eye balled the thickness. Since I am going to be attempting making my own phyllo dough I bought this to make it easier. I haven't used it for phyllo yet, but I have found that the various rings on the ends take all the guess work out of rolling dough. PS-the purple ring is perfect for making scones.
customer_reviews.author: Cappie Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Was sent a used and dirty rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: The rolling pin that I received is used. It is covered in flour and sprinkles. I have celiac disease and any flour makes me extremely ill. I purchased a new rolling pin to be sent one that will make me very sick.
customer_reviews.author: Familyof7

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this rolling pin. Although the rings to adjust height would have been helpful, the wood on the pin was so rough that a smooth finish on dough was impossible to achieve. When I purchase another, it will be marble to assure I don't have the same problem. I will say that the return process went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly K.

customer_reviews.title: This rolling pin works great for making sure dough is rolled out evenly
customer_reviews.text: This rolling pin works great for making sure dough is rolled out evenly. Because of the rings you have to take small amounts of dough or the rings cut in to the dough, so not sure how good this would work for large pie crust. Also, I’m use to a traditional rolling pin with handles on the ends, so after a day of using this the palms of my hands were a little sore from pushing.
customer_reviews.author: SassyK

customer_reviews.title: Makes life easy
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid home baker and debated for a really long time on buying this rolling pin but glad that I finally did. So easy to use with the different size rings that w sure all your dough is rolled evenly. This makes for a much better bake on cookies, crusts etc! Wish it came with 5/16” rings too. Will order these separately. I was using a homemade set of sticks to measure thickness of dough but that only gave me one thickness-with this pin, it is so easy to change out rings for multiple thicknesses of dough. Definite time saver
customer_reviews.author: shoemethemoney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I use it for cookie dough. COOKIES I baked came out Great! LEVONNE'S UNIQUE CAKES
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Burns

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd had this years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know where this has been all my life. It's amazing. My pie crusts are even and beautiful. My ONE complaint is that the writing on the sides of the pin is too faint for me to see clearly with my older eyes, especially once there's a layer of flour on it. Otherwise, it's just stellar, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. K. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great new tool for long-time and new bakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have been baking over 50 years! Found a new recipe for Christmas cookies that was very specific on the thickness of the dough rolled out. Just by accident saw a rolling pin that could adjust for rolling of dough thickness. Found this amazing Joseph rolling pin on Amazon. IT WAS AMAZING. Our sugar cookie bakeoff with grandkids was a great success, thanks to this Joseph rolling pin product. Price was also very good. Thank you for offering this product on your site. I'm telling all about it. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite rolling pin!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I didn't replace my heavy marble rolling pin years ago. I was making dozens of wedding cookies, so I ordered this rolling pin - and will never use another one. It used to be hard to roll the dough to the desired thickness, now it's a no-brainer. Our daughter saw how easy it is to roll out a thickness of dough and requested one for Christmas. Now I'm back on Amazon to buy her one - and also one for our new daughter in law!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Such

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait to buy this ??
customer_reviews.text: I am still asking myself why I waited so long to finally buy this!!! It came with the discs that help achieve the common widths most recipes call for. I just made it through Christmas baking in record time. It saved me so much aggravation by rolling things unevenly and too thinly. I achieved consistent cookies every time. The discs pop in and out easily and it cleans up a bit harder then some rolling pins because there is no finish on the pin itself. Buy this for the baker in your life if they don’t have it !
customer_reviews.author: Babs Wake

customer_reviews.title: ehh just get a regular rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could roll pie dough. the pre-set measurements for the rings don't include the usual thickness for regular pie dough. I didn't return it, because you can still use it, but didn't think it was worth a lot more than what you could buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Genius.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my friend who is a baker by trade. She LOVES it! She says it saves her time and dough always even so cookies bake evenly. No guesswork. And she's not just saying that bc I bought it for her, because I see it out and used on days I'm not in the store (I volunteer in her bakery! As everyone else said, MAKE IT LONGER. Be sure to keep the rings in a ziploc or they'll get lost
customer_reviews.author: ebbandflow

customer_reviews.title: Let The Good Times Roll
customer_reviews.text: Where has this rolling pin been my whole life? We already had 2-3 rolling pins and surely didn't need another. But when we started making cookies we wanted something that could roll dough with a uniform thickness. In rolls this pin (pun intended). Joseph Joseph has done it again! This pin is fun to look at with its bright colors and flexible to use. And a big bang for the buck! Buy it! Gift it! Enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick K

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today and it was packaged very well. It was in a huge box with paper all around it and the rolling pin itself was in the clear box you can see in the picture. The knob at the end is very easy to twist off and each disc shows the thickness your dough will be. This is my first Joseph Joseph product and it seems very well made and definitely would make a nice gift for anyone you know who loves to bake.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: This has been absolutely amazing and beyond my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know what to say in that this thing is great. Best rolling pin i've ever owned. I bought it for sugar cookies but use it also for pie crust, and pastries. My cookies come out perfectly even which has helped them look more professional as I bake and sell them to a few friends and family. Its been nothing be phenomenal and i can't stress enough how great it works, and how much it has helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis H.

customer_reviews.title: So easy to get the right dough thickness
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I bought this after last X'mas. I hated making cut out cookies with my Grandmother's old rolling pin because I could never get the dough a uniform thickness. I waited until this X'mas to write this review. It was so easy to use and the cookies turned out great. I wish that I would have traded in my old rolling pin years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Grace

customer_reviews.title: So Handy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure these types of rolling pins have been around for a while, but I'd had the same old rolling pin for about 40 years. It worked fine, so I've never looked at any others. But, I recently moved and somehow, lost my rolling pin. Anyway....I bought this one and love it!! I made chicken and dumplings tonight and no more thick to thin dumplings! They're all the same thickness and cooked evenly. I love this rolling pin!
customer_reviews.author: EastTexasHappy

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are ok with a warped and out of round $20 piece of wood and plastic...spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: John I. Mielke

customer_reviews.title: should have had this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: What a difference it makes to have a rolling pin that keeps everything even, and you can control the thickness of your baked goods. Prior to getting the Joseph Joseph rolling pin I had to guess at the thickness and hope that my dough was the same thickness all the way through. It wasn't. No more guess work! Easy to change the disks and the dough doesn't stick. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cracked upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love this rolling pin. The plastic attachments make it so easy to get the perfect thickness on the dough, and uniformly as well. I was disappointed to discover the wood rolling pin was cracked lengthwise. I did not use it right away so didn't discover this until it was too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi v

customer_reviews.title: This is extremely useful, but the guids on the side are not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely useful, but the guids on the side are not terribly precise. There is no locking mechinism to ensure the guides are screwed on completely level, so you wind up with the guide allowing more space on one edge than the other. This variance isn't so great as to cause a problem for the thicker guids, but for the thin ones, it _is_ noticable, and results in less even pastry. Though it is still MUCH better than me trying to guess by hand.
customer_reviews.author: JTaylor

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rolling pin! I absolutely LOVE the rings on the ends to keep everything a uniform thickness. I previously bought the kind that slip on to any rolling pin, but I hated them! They never stayed on and were difficult to use. This design makes it so easy! They are a nice, heavy-duty plastic and do exactly what they are supposed to do. The rolling pin itself is easy to use and easy to clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Baby J's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t wait to get this item. After a week of it not showing up, Amazon was great in replacing my original order. Once the rolling pin arrived, I made a batch of cookie dough. I like that you can change the thickness and get an even roll. It was easy to roll out the dough and the cookies came out great. I also used this pin on air clay. Once again, it rolled smoothly and evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I really love this rolling pin!! It is easier to use and clean than my metal one. I really like the adjustable rings, my only complaint is I wish they were easier to take off and put on. cookie dough and moist flour is a little hard to clean off, but since things stick less to it than the metal I can let that go. So far so good, but I haven't used it too much. right now I give it 5 stars if that changes I will update.
customer_reviews.author: sweethrt

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with the precision this tool affords me. It significantly improves my baking. It takes a few minutes to remove the “screws “ and reattach the desired discs, and it took me a few minutes to adjust to using my hands on the roller. I was used to a rolling pin with handles and ball bearings. But those were the only two slight negatives I encountered. These were outweighed by end product of having cookies, pie crusts, etc come out precisely as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rolling pin
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rolling pin! Really cuts out the angst of getting your dough an even thickness. It's very simple, you leave on the ring of the largest depth you want and just roll. The pin is a nice length too, I wasn't sure if it would be long enough, but for the home baker, it's great! Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shelby

customer_reviews.title: A good tool with a little practice
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. The disk measurements are different than what I’m used to- there’s not a 1/8” but there’s a 1/6”. I needed to adjust my rolling skills since you are limited to the width of the rolling pin. That would be the thing I’d change- make it 24” long. That being said I love the consistency factor. That more than makes up for any shortcomings.
customer_reviews.author: Idahojack

customer_reviews.title: Best rolling pin ever !
customer_reviews.text: Best rolling pin I used in my life . I found from a cookie artist I follow on social media . I used to roll out sugar cookie dough and it worked amazing . Every single cookie measured the same height . I am so happy I found this item and the price is well worth it . I would also recommend washing and drying immediately .
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: After months of owning
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product! I find that sometimes when I'm rolling things out, my dough is still uneven. I'm not sure why, even if I have everything on a flat surface. But after a few times of rolling it all evens out. This product makes things so easy! <3 I love it so very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying flaw
customer_reviews.text: The laser etched logo leaves an imprint on the surface of the whatever you’re rolling out. Other than that it’s an ok rolling pin, but that issue makes it hard for me to recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Rolling with no worrying
customer_reviews.text: Love this, love how it keeps the dough the same thickness. Don’t have to worry about uneven cooking/burning. Wipes off easily and a classy gift for a person who bakes. Joseph Joseph has many useful items, we have slotted spoons, spatula’s, and sets of color coded cutting boards. Never a worry with Joseph Joseph!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ehnert

customer_reviews.title: The wood warped
customer_reviews.text: I loved this rolling pin until one day it was not rolling even. I thought it was my rolling technique but when I checked closer the wood had warped and could no longer roll out the dough at the same depth. I attempted to contact the company by phone and was given an email but never received a reply. Totally bummed!!! JG
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Takes out the guess work
customer_reviews.text: Great for cutting sugar cookies for uniform thickness. However, for me, the 1'4" disc was too thin yet the 3/8" was too thick so I just use the 1/4" to roll out my dough just before the disc touches the working surface. The smaller discs are perfect for linzer cookies. Great gift for a baker!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: I took a class
customer_reviews.text: I went to a cookie decorating class, the instructor recommended this rolling pin. She was right! This rolling pin gives you evenly measured cookies every time, definitely don’t have to eyeball it! ￼ I am so glad I purchased this! This is on my favorite things list FOR SURE!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Father's Day present
customer_reviews.text: So I am a bit early on the father's day train, but we have needed a rolling pin (and by we, I mean the husband who is the baker in the house). I loved my mother's marble rolling pin that she had when I was little, but was displeased with the ratings of those. So I decided to try this one out. I pulled it out of the box and was SHOCKED at 1. How long it is and 2. the weight of it. The pictures really didn't do this one justice. I am so excited to give it to him because I think that he will LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great little helper!
customer_reviews.text: A professional baker recommended this product to me, very happy with it. The various size rings are a huge help in making sure my dough is the same depth all around. I like that I can store the rings on the roller at all times. Fast, dependable delivery.
customer_reviews.author: YorkieMomX4

customer_reviews.title: Arrived incomplete
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for rolling out clay in different thicknesses. I just opened the SEALED bag it was in and noticed I am missing one of the 10mm rings. This was a Prime shipment but it took a week to get here. I need an adjustable rolling pin so I’m just going to keep it but I think it’s pretty sad that the company sealed this up knowing it was incomplete. Will not buy from this manufacturer again unless I receive the missing part (I would also update this review). Tried to find a way to message the seller on Amazon but can’t. Really disappointed because this is a nice rolling pin and the concept is great.
customer_reviews.author: heidie fifield

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I find negative is the cleaning. Unscrewing the ends and making sure nothing gets in and clogs the threaded holes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up taking the rings off because they were more hindering than help. Dough circumference is very limited with them on.the wood itself is a bit rough. I’m hoping with some care it’ll get smoother. For the price I paid, I can’t complain Too much. It’s a rolling pin.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Makes an expert out of a novice. Ty
customer_reviews.text: Unique item well engineered to make your baking very consistent. We use it primarily for cookies and this just gives such a good result. Never have to adjust cooking times due to varying thicknesses and for precision work it just cant be beat. If you’re making a dozen cookies NBD but if you’re making 200 for an exchange its a big time saver. Worth the $$ and drawer space.
customer_reviews.author: Denis

customer_reviews.title: Loving It
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I really liked the concept of having the thickness guides. I ended up using it twice in preparing Super Bowl snacks and it was fantastic! I made a thicker, Keto pizza crust that was perfectly even. Even more impressive (to me anyway) was the batch of really thin crackers I made that were also wonderfully thin and even.
customer_reviews.author: Number1Gal

customer_reviews.title: Was pretty nervous to buy after some reviews, but...
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the reviews I was nervous about how mine would come in. Everything was all in one piece with no cracks. The removable rings are perfect and easy to clean. As another customer stated about the guys name being imprinted in her cookies, I was worried about the same thing happening to mine, but not once has it left a print in my cookies. I would definitely recommend this product! Don't let bad reviews ruin a good outcome!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Quality better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like it, and I think it’s a good quality for the price. I was afraid it was going to be poor quality because of the price. I am disappointed though because the biggest setting it a tad too big, and the next size down is a tad too small. But overall I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfying
customer_reviews.text: I used this roller three times and was disappointed that my cookies are not even. I just realized that it is warp. How do I go about requesting a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for all kinds of uses
customer_reviews.text: I'm a potter and I use this rolling pin to roll out specific thicknesses of clay slabs. While I make most of my pottery on the wheel, sometimes I need a good even slab to do a mixed design. It works great for that! I can see how it would be easy to use for kitchen applications. Simple design, easy to use, perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny B

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I think of that?
customer_reviews.text: Clever design. For those of us who are rolling pin challenged when it comes to even thickness, it's a winner. The downside is that the wood of the pin is not sealed and you need to constantly keep it well floured - making it a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable Thickness to Roll Out Biscuits, Pie Crust, Cookies, Rugelach
customer_reviews.text: What a great rolling pin! The adjustable guides slide on/off to make the perfect thickness. Easy to use, perfect calculation of thickness without having to guess. A useful item for yourself or to give as a gift for someone who likes to bake! What a great invention.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller for the ability to make sure all my cookies are always the same thickness. However, I do with it hand handles. When rolling sometimes it just slips out of my hands and flies off the counter. Maybe that’s just me lol but it happens often because there’s no where to drip when my dough is still a big mound and I have to use firm pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Erikas823

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, nice looking too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my daughter who has become quite the baker. She loves it although it did arrived with a small dent in the wood, but it does not really affect the way it works. It replaces an old one that just isn't as precise to roll with.
customer_reviews.author: RDR

customer_reviews.title: Handy good quality rolling pin.
customer_reviews.text: We like using the Joseph rolling pin. It’s a handy tool. I’m an newbie to baking so the Joseph spacer /thickness disc system saves time and helps me roll out very consistent dough thickness. Very good quality and finish on the wooden pin and all plastic parts.
customer_reviews.author: Guy T

customer_reviews.title: Great roller
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one for me and one for my sister. It is great for baking certain cookies or pastries which require a certain height. This roller not only kept my dough to the correct thickness, but was also easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Margret N.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It really makes rolling out cookie dough convenient. The cookies come out the perfect size every time so that they cook evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Even thickness yields more cookies!
customer_reviews.text: Best product ever! Made my cookie baking effortless this year! It's easy to use and good quality. My cookies all came out the same thickness and cooked evenly. This made my yield of cookies larger since I didn't have to throw any unsuitable ones out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was very clever and ordered it immediately upon seeing the ad. Product is built to last, however, you are limited in size to 13 1/2 inches. It will not work for a larger dough.
customer_reviews.author: cmp

customer_reviews.title: A real problem solver
customer_reviews.text: This rolling pin solved the problem of not being sure of the thickness of the dough I have to roll out. The interchangeable disks are great, and there are enough sizes for just about anything I might have to make. The wooden pin is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool
customer_reviews.text: I had this sitting in drawer for a while and just recently got the opportunity try out this rolling pin to make holiday cookies (a task I've always avoided). This made rolling out the dough so much easier than a standard rolling pin. All of the cookies were a consistent height. I appreciate the tool but still don't like rolling out cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT COOKIE THICKNESS!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rolling pin! I rolled my sugar cookies using the biggest ring and they came out perfect! Super easy to use and clean. I especially liked that it’s slightly wider/longer than parchment paper because I rolled my dough between 2 pieces of parchment paper and the rings were just outside the paper edges so it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Finally even cookie dough!
customer_reviews.text: The rolling pin worked great and the added spacers did a fabulous job of making sure my sugar cookie dough was a uniform thickness. The only reason for the 4 stars is that I prefer a rolling pin with handles on the sides. That is just a matter of preference and probably not possible with the changeable guides but I find those a little easier to use. Otherwise this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: mhale23

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The rolling pin does what it is supposed to do, press out the dough as you prepare it for use. The removable rings on the sides are to help with getting the proper thickness of the dough for pies and such.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: A must have for Roll out cookies!!
customer_reviews.text: Being an avid baker, I am always looking for new items to help with the process. This is definitely in the top 3 of cookie baking must haves along with my Kitchen Aid stand mixer and Wilton Airbake cookie sheets! I used to do a hack for roll out cookies to make the dough the right thickness along with my traditional rolling pin. This adjustable rolling pin is that hack brought to a professional level. I can't wait for christmas cookie season to come now that this has been added to the lineup!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S-J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cookies every time!
customer_reviews.text: We love this rolling pin. We had one and just recently bought this one as a gift. Makes the perfect thickness cookie every time. We tend to be cookie perfectionist and this rolling pin assured every cookie we bake is the perfect thickness!
customer_reviews.author: srblock

customer_reviews.title: Um, get this if you bake.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I was skeptical because I like fat, thick and soft cookies. Even on the highest setting, they aren't as fat as I like them but this is awesome for keeping things the same thickness. Easy and great for baking!
customer_reviews.author: Selena Morefield

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but I don't use it much anymore
customer_reviews.text: This thing works very well for uniformity, but as I got better at rolling, I found I no longer needed it to get consistent results. Also, its not wide enough to roll large pizza dough or fondant. Great for cookies though!
customer_reviews.author: Dogs Are Great

customer_reviews.title: Helpful tool!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for my cookie business for about 5 months and am very happy with it! Definitely helps to keep cookies same thickness. Not supposed to submerge in water so sometimes takes a bit of wiping to get all dough remnants off. Also need to oil periodically- not hard to do, just need to remember to do it!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best things I have ever bought! I've always used a regular rolling pin to make cookies & after reading some blog posts, I decided to snag one of these guys. For those who bake a lot, this is a MUST HAVE. The thickness of the cookies I make are so consistent - you never have to worry about getting some that are too thin or too thick. It would also be a fantastic gift idea to those who are into baking!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: works as shown
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 different rolling pins, and my friend had this one we used during our Xmas baking extravaganza, worked great for sugar cookies. Purchased one of my own and couldn't be happier. Well worth it, and have already had some family members asking about it.
customer_reviews.author: ALK95

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had an adjustable rolling pin until my friend recommended. It’s easy to use and easy to clean. I’m not use to having handles that aren’t independent of the rolling pen though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great rolling pin. The color-coded adjustment rings are simple to use and make it easy to roll dough to the perfect thickness. I would buy this again as a gift because I'm keeping mine.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and the spacers on the ends are just ...
customer_reviews.text: Where has this rolling pin been all my life? Great quality and the spacers on the ends are just what I need to roll out even sheets of cookie dough so when cutting them with cookie cutters, they are all the same thickness. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Expected more...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone hyped this product, so I was very excited to try it. Unfortunately, after the first use and wash, the wood cracked on the ends. I followed all of the instructions, so there was no reason why this should happen. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: PassionwithHeart

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea but not as functional as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: So the hole is off center so that one side of the guide ring is significantly larger than the other side. It’s beautiful and works better than eyeballing it. I wish it came with an 8mm ring because the 10 mm is huge and the 6mm is too small...
customer_reviews.author: Shye Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is hands-down my favorite cooking utensil for the holidays. Getting my gingerbread, pie crust, and sugar cookies exactly the thickness they need to be is amazing. Seriously if you're on the fence just freaking by this thing it's amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jaucilynn

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister but I may get one for myself too. We have been making cutout sugar cookies every holiday season since we were kids and it’s sometimes difficult to get the dough the right thickness for that perfect chewy cookie. This rolling pin is the best thing that has happened to our baking day. The cookies were the perfect thickiness and oh so chewy. We’ll never make these cookies without it again. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Don't make another batch of cookies without this!
customer_reviews.text: This is so perfect for getting the perfect thickness on every cookie. How we ever made cookies without this bad boy is beyond me. Don't hesitate to get this.... No seriously... Don't hesitate... You will love it like I do...
customer_reviews.author: Randy W.

customer_reviews.title: Roll out this awesome Pin
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for all of my desert making needs, what a great product, the adjustable rings come in handy when choosing thickness of dough, plus the markings on pin allows for that perfect roll! All bakers this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best. Roller. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be the first to admit I was reluctant to buy this product. I had my doubts, but I thought, it’s $20. If it sucks, oh well. The worst thing about this product is the amount of time it takes to screw/unscrew the attachment on either end. Which is just me being impatient. It’s a wonderful product. My cookies were even and I am so absolutely in love with this roller!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginner Bakers!
customer_reviews.text: i'm still just learning to bake properly and because my depth perception is less than fantastic, getting my dough's rolled out evenly is a huge challenge... this rolling pin made my xmas cookie escapade much simpler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great rolling Pin!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old fashioned rolling pin, but I'm not ashamed to say I'm not great at eyeballing the dough thickness, so I broke down and got one with the wheels on the end so I can have proper and consistent thickness. I like the length of this pin and the wheels on the end are easy to switch out.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora2288

customer_reviews.title: A must have for making cookies with kids
customer_reviews.text: I love this roller! I’ve had one for a couple years. I got it for my best friend for Christmas. It makes perfectly even cookies, even when little hands want to roll and roll!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this rolling pin!!! I literally make thousands of cutout sugar cookies every year and this makes it so easy to keep consistent thickness! I use mine alot and only hand wash it lightly, I've oiled it a couple times and have had no issues with cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Soli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every time!
customer_reviews.text: I've never been very good at making even thicknesses when rolling, so this is basically made of magic for me. Everything comes out perfectly as long as you are fine with the width of the roller being your limit.
customer_reviews.author: zemcclure

customer_reviews.title: Helps roll dough evenly
customer_reviews.text: This works great for rolling dough evenly. There are several discs to use for different sizes. I always had trouble getting dough even for cookies but this really helped!
customer_reviews.author: TPGC

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars if not the ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if not the fact the logo shows up on whatever is rolled out with it, Yes I realize that I can turn the dough over but that wasn't possible with the delicate dough. So, if you don't mind or doesn't matter that the text imprinted on your dough it's 4 star product!
customer_reviews.author: HuntnLady

product_meta.title: Joseph Joseph Adjustable Rolling Pin with Removable Rings, 13.6", Multi-Color
product_meta.description:
Color:MulticolorIncludes four sets of removable discs: 3/8", 1/4", 1/6" and 1/16"Rolling pin dimensions: 16 1/2" x 2 1/2" x 2 1/2" Discs: dishwasher safeRolling pin: hand wash only

BRAND STORY
By Joseph Joseph
feature_bullets: Adjustable rolling pin evenly flattens dough to ensure uniform baking
Solid beech construction with etched pastry-width measurement guide
1/16, 1/6, 1/4, and 3/8-inch removable discs make it simple to roll to a desired thickness
Great for pizza and pie crusts, tarts, cookies, and more; hand-wash for best results

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars5,992 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
